name: claude-project-selector
title: Claude Project Selector
description: Select and export Claude Code projects to Obsidian
author: florian

commands.name: select-project
commands.title: Select Claude Project
commands.description: Select a Claude Code project to export to Obsidian

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
